title: Break Check: Transcription-Driven Topoisomerase II Collisions near Chromatin Loop Anchors Are Hotspots for DNA Damage and Translocations.
abstract: In this issue of Molecular Cell, Gothe, Maman et al. and Canela et al. demonstrate that type II topoisomerase (TOP2B/TOP2A)-mediated DNA breaks, and the oncogenic translocations they generate, are dependent on transcription and governed by chromatin architecture.
